title: Ashes of the Singularity v1.24 + 3 DLC (GOG) 2016
description:
Information:

-Release Date: March 31, 2016
-Genre: Strategy (Real-time), 3D
-Release from: GOG
-Language: English, German
-Language: English, German
-Subtitle Language: English, German
-Version: 1.24.20823


System requirements:

-Operating System: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
-Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD Processor
-RAM: 6 GB
-Hard Drive: 13 GB
-Video Card: 2 GB GDDR5 NVidia GeForce 660 / AMD R7 360 or better

Description:

Ashes of the Singularity large-scale and ambitious strategy for the battle about supermen armies. If you think that robots will enslave us, you're right. But just because they have enslaved us: look only at what they do neural networks! Computers already know how to drive a car, recognize faces, paint, and even to dream. Very soon, laying in the form of humanity will not need them and there will be only one way out: you can not win - join us! With heroes Ashes of the Singularity something like this happened: improved ultra-modern technology, people began to actively conquer the space and improve technology, using its digital brain. But when the triumph of Homo sapiens, it would seem, it was the ultimate, beastly nature took over, and the war: it seems, lust for power and propensity to violence desperately hard encrypted in our genetic "firmware".

DLC's:

-dlc Overlord
-dlc Gauntlet
-dlc Turtle Wars

Installation and startup:

-Run the installation file.
-Follow the installation instructions.
-Set dlc.
-Play
